text: Vanja Radovanović (; born 28 October 1982) is a Montenegrin singer and songwriter. He represented Montenegro in the Eurovision Song Contest 2018 in Lisbon, Portugal, with the song "Inje", however failed to make the final, coming 16th place in Semi-final 2.https://eurovisionworld.com/eurovision/2018/semi-final-2 ==References== == External links == * Category:1982 births Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants of 2018 Category:Living people Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants for Montenegro Category:Montenegrin male singers Category:Montenegrin songwriters Category:Musicians from Belgrade Category:People from Nikšić
title: Vanja Radovanović
